codelog.content:
Plan for the day

  • Finish an article about specificity.
  • Start watching Complete Intro to Web Development, v2 by Brian Holt.
    • Don't forget to make notes!
  • Start moving content to subdomains to have a clear landing page.

Learned today

  • You can have multiple images in a single *.svg file and access them via their IDs:
<img src="/assets/img/icon.svg#github" />
